ygData.subject: Re: SV: Re: Skill Cap
ygData.msgSnippet: That was a very nice post.... and we definatly have some articulate people here .. ( I am not one of them... thats why I usually read instead of write) after
ygData.messageBody:
That was a very nice post.... and we definatly have some articulate people
here .. ( I am not one of them... thats why I usually read instead of write)
after today....I will not post anymore... you guys can find out on your
own... It doesnt bother me that I dont help... (which is all I was trying to
do originally). Take care Onelist... at least there was somewhere for us
tinker'ers to go .... took me a long time to find it too.
